formattedAddress: 2201 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2201 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10032-2502, USA

originalText.text: My experience with Capture Timeline Photography was truly amazing! Shawn and his wife Lani were very accommodating and considerate to my requests and preferences. In fact, he has given me a great family photo session package for my grandparents’ 60th wedding anniversary, which is a very important event for me and my family. We loved everything from his service to the finished product. He captured every moment that were important to us and he even suggested some ideas for nice shots. He is very prepared, professional, and organized. I highly recommend Shawn as a photographer for any of your family events! Thanks again Shawn and looking forward to be working with you again in the future.

originalText.text: Shawn was a pleasure to work with! He was attentive, charismatic and easygoing. We had so much fun doing our couple christmas shoot and most importantly his shots were astonishing. We were absolutely delighted with the results. 10/10 would recommend! ⭐️⭐️⭐️

text.text: Shawn was a pleasure to work with! He was attentive, charismatic and easygoing. We had so much fun doing our couple christmas shoot and most importantly his shots were astonishing. We were absolutely delighted with the results. 10/10 would recommend! ⭐️⭐️⭐️

originalText.text: It was lovely collaborating with Shawn. We’ve done a couple shoots and he’s open to new ideas, concepts, and he’s constantly updating his equipment and skills. He even had ideas to work with colored gases! Would definitely recommend him and collaborate again. I added two of my favorites from the separate shoots I did with him if anyone needs an example of his work.

originalText.text: My experience with Capture Lifetime was an excellent one! Shawn is extremely flexible when it comes to times and locations and very responsive when it comes to planning your shoot! The pictures turned out great and my experience as a whole was very very good. I highly recommend to anyone that is looking for a very experienced and dedicated photographer. By far one of the best photographers I’ve shot with!

text.text: My experience with Capture Lifetime was an excellent one! Shawn is extremely flexible when it comes to times and locations and very responsive when it comes to planning your shoot! The pictures turned out great and my experience as a whole was very very good. I highly recommend to anyone that is looking for a very experienced and dedicated photographer. By far one of the best photographers I’ve shot with!

originalText.text: I can’t speak highly enough about Shawn and his work! Not only does he have a great eye for amazing photos, he’s an absolute pleasure to work with, from the first enquiry to final photos being sent. It was my first time ever taking photos and I didn’t know what to expect but wound up having a blast! I’ve already highly recommended him to friends ;)
